title: Refund policy
content: We process refunds within 5–7 business days back to the original payment method.

title: App crashes on launch
content: Common causes are outdated app version, corrupted cache, or network issues.

title: Reset password
content: Users can reset their password using the 'Forgot password' link on the login screen.

title: Double charges
content: If you notice duplicate charges, contact support and we will reverse the extra payment.

title: Card declined
content: A card may be declined due to expired date, insufficient balance, or bank restrictions.

title: Slow loading
content: Slow performance is often caused by poor network connection or overloaded device cache.

title: Refund eligibility
content: Refunds apply only to transactions made within the last 30 days.

title: Update email
content: Users can update their email from the profile settings page.

title: UI not loading
content: A blank UI usually indicates a caching issue or missing resources in the latest update.

title: Login issues
content: If login fails, verify credentials, reset password, or check server status.

title: Invoice requests
content: Customers can download invoices from the billing portal under Payment History.

title: Refund delays
content: Bank processing may take up to 10 business days depending on the institution.

title: Delete account
content: To delete an account, users must submit a verified deletion request for security reasons.

title: Buttons not responding
content: Unresponsive buttons often occur due to JavaScript errors in the recent build.

title: App update fails
content: Update failures may occur due to insufficient storage or an outdated OS version.

title: Change subscription
content: Subscription changes take effect immediately unless scheduled for next billing.

title: Change username
content: Usernames can be changed once every 30 days via the profile section.

title: Partial refund
content: Partial refunds apply when only part of the service was used.

title: Notifications not showing
content: Missing notifications may be caused by OS notification permissions.

title: Server downtime
content: We occasionally perform maintenance which may cause brief service interruptions.

title: Payment receipt
content: Receipts are sent automatically via email after each transaction.

title: Two-factor authentication
content: 2FA adds an extra layer of protection by requiring a verification code at login.

title: Unauthorized charge refund
content: Unauthorized transactions are refunded immediately upon verification.

title: Error code 500
content: A 500 error indicates a temporary server-side issue.

title: Audio not working
content: Audio problems usually require clearing cache or restarting the app.

title: Promo code failure
content: If a promo code fails, ensure it hasn’t expired or reached its usage limit.

title: Link social accounts
content: Social login can be enabled from the Account > Linked Accounts section.

title: Refund confirmation
content: Customers receive a confirmation email after a refund is issued.

title: Scrolling issues
content: Scrolling glitches are typically fixed by updating to the latest version.

title: Video not loading
content: Video issues may be caused by network throttling or unsupported codecs.

title: Overcharge
content: If overcharged, users are compensated with a refund or account credit.

title: Phone number update
content: Phone numbers can be updated in the profile settings.

title: Refund method
content: Refunds are always returned to the original payment method used at checkout.

title: App freezing
content: Freezing occurs due to memory leaks or background process overloads.

title: Image upload failure
content: Image uploads require stable internet and supported formats like JPG or PNG.

title: Missing invoice
content: If an invoice is missing, users can request a manual copy from support.

title: Session timeout
content: Sessions expire after long inactivity for security purposes.

title: Refund denied
content: Refunds may be denied if the request is outside the refund window.

title: Text overlap
content: Text layout issues often arise from font rendering bugs.

title: Connectivity problems
content: Use Wi-Fi or check mobile data permissions if connection seems unstable.

title: Billing cycle info
content: Billing cycles vary based on subscription plan and country.

title: Password strength
content: Users must choose strong passwords including letters and numbers.

title: Suspected fraud
content: Fraud cases are escalated to our risk and compliance team.

title: Keyboard not opening
content: Soft keyboard failures are usually triggered by OS-level bugs.

title: App overheating
content: Overheating may happen during heavy processing tasks or poor ventilation.

title: Cancel subscription
content: Subscriptions can be canceled anytime via the Billing section.

title: Account locked
content: Accounts lock temporarily after too many failed logins.

title: Refund notifications
content: Refund notices are sent both via email and in-app alerts.

title: Links not opening
content: Broken links may indicate outdated app routing logic.

title: Screen flickering
content: Screen flickering is often related to GPU or rendering engine issues.

title: Expired card
content: Update your payment method if the saved card has expired.

title: Profile picture upload
content: Profile pictures must be under 5MB in size.

title: Refund policy exceptions
content: Special cases like duplicate charges are always eligible for refunds.

title: Dark mode glitch
content: Dark mode issues may appear after UI theme updates.

title: File download failure
content: Ensure storage permissions are enabled before downloading.

title: Incorrect currency
content: Currency depends on region settings in the user's profile.

title: Language settings
content: Language can be changed from the Settings > Localization menu.

title: Refund review time
content: Some refunds require manual review which may take 24–48 hours.

title: Search bar not working
content: Search issues may arise from indexing bugs.

title: GPS not working
content: Enable location permissions under OS settings.

title: Tax calculation
content: Taxes vary depending on location and applicable laws.

title: Reactivation
content: Deactivated accounts can be reactivated within 30 days.

title: Subscription refund
content: Subscription refunds are prorated based on usage.

title: Audio delay
content: Audio sync errors occur due to rendering queue lags.

title: Bluetooth issues
content: Bluetooth requires OS-level pairing and app permissions.

title: Chargeback disputes
content: Chargebacks are resolved with bank collaboration.

title: Email verification
content: Users must verify their email to access certain features.

title: Refund to wallet
content: Some refunds may be issued as wallet credits.

title: Animations broken
content: Animation bugs occur after UI engine upgrades.

title: Login session expired
content: Expired tokens require a fresh login.

title: Payment method support
content: We accept major credit/debit cards and UPI where supported.

title: Deactivate account
content: Users may temporarily deactivate accounts from settings.

title: Refund for add-ons
content: Add-on purchases follow a separate refund policy.

title: Screen rotation issue
content: Orientation problems occur due to accelerometer bugs.

title: Microphone not working
content: Check microphone permissions first.

title: Pending payment
content: Pending transactions resolve automatically within minutes.

title: Manage devices
content: Users can view and remove logged-in devices.

title: Multiple refunds request
content: Multiple refunds require case-by-case approval.

title: Color inversion issue
content: Incorrect color themes may indicate accessibility setting conflicts.

title: Cache corruption
content: Clear the app cache to fix data corruption.

title: Subscription upgrade
content: Upgrading subscription takes effect immediately.

title: Child account restrictions
content: Child accounts have limited permissions for safety.

title: Refund confirmation missing
content: If confirmation is missing, verify bank statement manually.

title: Gesture issues
content: Gesture recognition bugs occur on older devices.

title: Screen resolution mismatch
content: Adjust display settings to avoid stretched UI.

title: Add payment method
content: Users can add multiple cards for billing.

title: Username unavailable
content: Usernames must be unique and follow guidelines.

title: Refund timeline
content: Refunds may take longer during high-volume periods.

title: Loading spinner stuck
content: Stuck loaders usually mean incomplete network requests.

title: WiFi not detected
content: Restart your router or check device WiFi permissions.

title: Trial period info
content: Trials auto-convert to paid subscriptions unless canceled.

title: Login with OTP
content: OTP login must be completed within 60 seconds.

title: Refund for fraud case
content: Fraudulent transactions are refunded after identity verification.

title: Crash on logout
content: Logout crashes stem from unhandled cleanup processes.

title: App not installing
content: Check storage space and OS compatibility.

title: Promo rewards
content: Promo rewards apply automatically after eligible transactions.

title: Restricted access
content: Some features are restricted based on region.

title: Gift card refund
content: Gift card purchases are typically non-refundable.

title: Overlay not dismissing
content: Overlay bugs occur due to modal stacking issues.

title: Network timeout
content: Timeouts indicate slow or unstable internet connection.
